title: 9/21 - Players stuck in completed games (Ghost Games)
body:
>#Update 3:43PM

>Reports of new ghost games seem to be subsiding (meaning we're just waiting for the current ghost games to clear out. New games seem to be completing properly), but the team is still working to figure out why we saw a sudden increase earlier this morning/afternoon.  Root cause still unknown.

------------------------------

>#Update 2:14 PM

>The team is still triaging and investigating.  We're still working on identifying potential root causes.  Ghost games are fairly difficult to track in general and it's especially difficult to determine whether or not multiple instances of ghost games are related to the same root cause or just coincidentally happening at the same time.

>We've looped in a few more teams, so I'm hoping for a more meaningful update soon.

------------------------------

Hey everyone,

Seeing quite a few players reporting that they're stuck in games after they've finished ("ghost games").  We're taking a look and investigating what might be causing this to flare up again.  Ghost games can happen every once in a while, but it's definitely a bit unusual for so many players to be affected at the same time.

Will keep this thread updated with any new information!

Everything should still be there!  No information is actually lost in this kind of situation.  What's happening is that the message from the game server telling your client you're ready for another game gets lost, so your client thinks you're trying to reconnect to a game that doesn't exist anymore.

For the games, I hear you.  It should hopefully be far less than 3 hours, that's just the maximum amount of time. We're still working to see why more players than usual might be getting stuck.  We definitely want you to be able to play!

Gotcha.  This is happening because your client thinks you're in a game still and is trying to reconnect you to a game that no longer exists.   The "2-3 hours" is referencing the time it could take until your client finally realizes you're not in a game and stops trying to reconnect you.
